timestamp.description: Client-side timestamp for the trigger event.
timestamp.title: Timestamp

bbox.description: Bounding box [min_lon,min_lat,max_lon,max_lat]; defaults to product hazards at valid_time
bbox.title: Bbox

poi_ids.description: Optional POI ids to evaluate (filtered within bbox when provided)
poi_ids.title: Poi Ids

reasons.description: Summary of dominant risk factors across evaluated POIs
reasons.title: Reasons

merge_strategy.description: Rule for merging risk level with product severity
merge_strategy.title: Merge Strategy

risk_level.description: Risk level (1-5) when evaluated; null when unavailable
risk_level.title: Risk Level

parameters.description: Return the latest N runs (alias for limit with offset=0)
parameters.name: latest

schema.description: Return the latest N runs (alias for limit with offset=0)
schema.title: Latest
Response List Effect Presets Api V1 Effects Presets Get
Response Get Cldas Summary Api V1 Local Data Cldas Summary Get
Response Get Town Forecast Api V1 Local Data Town Forecast Get

parameters.description: Product id for risk evaluation lookup (must be provided together with valid_time)
parameters.name: product_id

schema.description: Product id for risk evaluation lookup (must be provided together with valid_time)
schema.title: Product Id

parameters.description: Valid time (ISO8601) for risk evaluation lookup (must be provided together with product_id)
parameters.name: valid_time

schema.description: Valid time (ISO8601) for risk evaluation lookup (must be provided together with product_id)
schema.title: Valid Time

parameters.description: Return 302 redirect to object storage when possible
parameters.name: redirect

schema.description: Return 302 redirect to object storage when possible
schema.title: Redirect
